mng: to cash, to exchange, to add (liquid), to blend, one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp, ☱

exm.mng: to cash, to exchange, to add (liquid), to blend, one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp, ☱
(of a cheque etc) to cash, to honor a commitment
remittance, funds paid to a bank account
to accept checks etc, to honor a check
to mix (different substances together), to blend
to cash, to change gold or silver into money
to arrange (colloquial), to transfer creditor's rights (in a debt case)
to blend various types of wine (or spirits, or fruit juices etc)

exm.pyn: jīn huì duì běn wèi zhì
